name: fight with me (AlisaLoL)
description:
WHO THE GAME IS FOR:

- For people in need of psychological help and support

- for fans of the k-pop group stray kids.

A short game filled with tips, ideas and quotes relating to psychological issues

the design of the player's friend Han is inspired by Han Jisung from the k-pop group Stray Kids

IMPORTANT! the character is totally original and is NOT identical to the real idol

also, the game and its tooltips occasionally feature authentic Han's statements (to complete the picture they are presented in Russian and English translations)

(These quotes are fully owned by Han and JYP)

- It's important to take care of your mental health as well as your physical health! - Han Jisung

If you found this game useful, you can buy me a coffee
